content:
If RA is running using nightly, then the "problems" with the code does not appear. If I switch to stable, then this works. I'm trying to figure out how to produce a minimal example of this, but unfortunately, I don't know how to troubleshoot this on my own. If you've got a hint, then please;

Issue I tried to make about this: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/10854

I don't know how to fix it. But I finally figured out that, with a fresh project, and then say I have one clippy-complaint in main.rs, the issue comes from

[profile.dev.package."*"]
opt-level = 2

and then having atleast one dependency.
This breaks it so vscode no longer receives error messages, warnings, etc.
I then tried to see if I can get the output to show why.. but nothing is coming up yet for me :(
Yeah, I shouldn't have said "solutions"... more like "share your progress" :-) https://xkcd.com/979/
I did post it on the issue that I referenced. :) And re-opened it.
